faqIntro: Talá biyano na mituna nyonso liboso okóta na boyekoli.

questions.question: Ndenge nini nakoki kokóma na cours ?
questions.answer: Kende na page ya inscription, sala compte, mpe poná cours olingi.

questions.question: Cours ezali na certificat ?
questions.answer: Ɛɛ, sima ya cours, okoki kokɔta certificat oyo bandimaka.

questions.question: Nakosala boni mpo na kokanga cours ?
questions.answer: Simá ya inscription, ozali na accès ya seko na cours.

questions.question: Cours ekoki kosalelama na téléphone ?
questions.answer: Ɛɛ, cours na biso ekoki kosalelama na téléphone, tablette, mpe ordinateur.

newsletterTitle: Kóma na lisolo na biso ya sango
newsletterText: Yeba sango ya mateya ya sika, offres spéciaux, mpe biloko ya kosalisa yo kobakisa mayele.
